channel.title: How do i make a no-ip server?
channel.description: How do i make a no-ip server? I've wanted one for a long time ;) If u no how to make one, post here, or email me at: bestkid720@hotmail.com

item.title: How do i make a no-ip server?
item.dc:creator: @Mladen Mladen
item.description:
@Mladen wrote:

ilyaostr9
Shut Up

Maybe he needs help, and if you wanna port forward, you must know your private ip which and be found doing this

  1. start-> Control pannel-> Network and Internet Connections -> Then look down should be Internet Connections -> Double click on the one your internet is on -> click on support at the top -> copy your ip adress, and the one thats like 192.168.0.1.

  2. then open your internet to your homepage
    Type:http://192.168.0.1 or whatever yours is.
    Then you’ll get a screen for username and pass
    Username: Admin
    Password: “Blank” or try password or 123

  3. Should open to your router find Games and you should see port forward:

You should see this.
Put in the following.
Make sure you have a no-ip .
www.no-ip.com and register download client make a new no-ip and your done!

“o” Enabled o Disabled
Name: Mopar
Private IP: “your ip adresss”
Protocol Type: Both
Private Port: 43594
Public Port: 43594

go to the link in my signature and please say i helped you
Schedule: Always

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a no-ip server?
